website_summaries.verdict: Kids will enjoy learning through trial and error how to push the huge and well-detailed triceratops backwards before it stomps all over their car collection.
pros: Launch cars at the chunky triceratops until it falls backward in defeat, or it lunges forward in an angry rampage

customer_reviews.title: Exciting to play with
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my sons favorite hot wheel toys. It’s pretty cool that you can ram the car into the triceratops to make the town fall down or to make the triceratops collapse. It is a bigger toy... My son is 3 1/2 and it’s probably half the length of his body. For a little while it was too big for him to carry by himself. And he wasn’t strong enough to make the Triceratops fall over. But now he’s got no problem with it. A little pricey, but he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and space
customer_reviews.text: The triceratops only fell forward the first 5 uses (if that) and now all he does is fall backwards, even when the car doesn't come in contact. If I had a penny for each time he fell backwards, I'd have been happy to make my money back. This is a long toy too, so now it's just taking up space. Do not waste your money on this, it will not hold anyone's attention long. It's just a giant green door stopper if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoFoodie

customer_reviews.title: Not much fun
customer_reviews.text: This is not very easy to play with. It does not combine well with other pieces and it did not hold my child's attention for long. The triceratops falls backwards and forwards and does not click into place when upright. Most of the time it just falls over on its own, unrelated to the cars motion.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my 3 yr old Grandson for his birthday. He loves dinosaurs. Was so excited when he opened it. Didn’t work not once!!! Very disappointed to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Lack-luster Hot Wheels Toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy just fell pretty flat for Hot Wheels enjoyment. There’s no real point. You press the lever and send the car a few inches forward. Some times the dinosaur falls forward, and sometimes it doesn’t. The toy enjoyment lasts 4-5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Pampooh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Doesn’t click in place.
customer_reviews.text: Another cheaply made high price toy. Doesn’t really work and takes a delicate hand to set up for each run through. Think a toddler is gonna be delicate or patient. No way. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Pecons

customer_reviews.title: Just alright. Buy the Cobra Crush instead.
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh it's alright. Doesn't do much to keep him entertained much. And, because I can't seem to write a review on the Cobra Crush, I'll do it here. Now that one? It's a must. It's VERY interactive and awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Tollison

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as shown
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to work right. My son loves hot wheels and dinosaurs but you set it and it does not work like pictures. He eventually disconnected it and doesn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hotwheels Toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 yr old nephew for xmas. Seems like it's going to be quite fun. Dinosaur is a great larger size. Great sale price too! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TDog

customer_reviews.title: Grandson enjoys it...it's a win!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson enjoys this immensely as it has Hot Wheels and dinosaurs all rolled into one package. I'd call that a win!
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun...
customer_reviews.text: My kids still play with this all the time. It works well, even if you make the track longer by adding it to another track. It’s nice, Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It wasn't worth it to me. Didn't work that well. My son still played with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our sons collection. He loves all things hot wheels. It’s super cool takes a little bit for the younger kids to figure out but still gets played with a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly P.

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Thank god I didnt pay $32 at the store. the mechanism is cheap and it only works half the time For this price I dont feel bad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Air

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: The child loved it. I got it because the Triceratops is my favorite dinosaur. Plus the kid loves dinosaurs and cars. So it was a win win.
customer_reviews.author: DukeOfNE

customer_reviews.title: The boy really loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I would personally give this 3 stars, but my 4yo really really loves it, so 4* it is.
customer_reviews.author: OW

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set from hot wheels city. The triceratops works really well both charging and falling backwards. It will entertain the kids well.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for hot wheels fans
customer_reviews.text: Got this oddly enough for my moms collection and she was obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: TOM B

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell if you are “doing it right”. Whether you win or the dino wins, seems random. This one frustrates my 4 yo, the 2 yo doesn’t care and just launches until something happens.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Preston

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and I have heard he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: pbb

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Hot Wheels collection
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for nephew. Will buy as gift for son given son’s reaction to nephew opening the gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy. Great action as the car pushes the triceratops backwards until it either is defeated or captures your car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Takes too much to get the dino to pop up
customer_reviews.author: Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to work as advertised. The dinosaur doesn’t stand up
customer_reviews.author: MamaMcC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for Christmas and he’s been loving it. So satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: LNJ

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves hot wheels and dinosaurs so this really fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The track is defective
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend it. Dinosaurs came defective, the latch does not work and the dinosaur does not rise, it immediately falls. Because of this, the child is not interested in playing.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Good toy but boring
customer_reviews.text: My grandson who loves dinosaurs and Hot Wheels found this very boring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Although easy to assemble, the product broke after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: DF

product_meta.title: Hot Wheels Smashin' Triceratops Play Set
product_meta.description: Kids are challenged to save Hot Wheels City from a giant rampaging Triceratops! This exciting set provides storytelling play based on heroic action and skill. Challenge kids to stop the giant Triceratops from charging by launching into the destructive dino to take him down! Set includes a huge Triceratops dino on Hot Wheels City Main Street, a slam launcher shaped like a truck with orange track and a dramatic takedown moment. Includes one Hot Wheels vehicle take down the Triceratops and save Hot Wheels City. Build a Hot Wheels City by connecting other City play sets together. City play sets are also compatible with orange track and other sets.
feature_bullets: Kids can put their skills to the test against the massive dino with multiple diecast cars for amped up storytelling and skill-based play
Load a Hot Wheels car into the launcher and slam into the Triceratops to try and take him down!
If the launch wasn't strong enough, the Triceratops charges towards the car destroying Main Street.
Kids are challenged to develop the skill and power to take the enormous Triceratops down. Knock him off his balance and he lands with a thump. The city is safe!
Reset is simple just push down the city street and reset the Triceratops.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars778 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
